sn17.38-43:1.2: “Daruno, bhikkhave, labhasakkarasiloko katuko pharuso antarayiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaya.
sn17.38-43:1.3: Idhaham, bhikkhave, ekaccam puggalam evam cetasa ceto paricca pajanami:
sn17.38-43:1.11: Tamenam passami aparena samayena labhasakkarasilokena abhibhutam pariyadinnacittam sampajanamusa bhasantam.
sn17.38-43:1.12: Evam daruno kho, bhikkhave, labhasakkarasiloko katuko pharuso antarayiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamaya.
sn17.38-43:1.14: ‘uppannam labhasakkarasilokam pajahissama, na ca no uppanno labhasakkarasiloko cittam pariyadaya thassati’ti.
